item.title: RDPClip
item.description: This is just a quick post to demonstrate some interesting aspects of the Remote Desktop Clipboard Monitor.

item.title: Jumping Network Segregation with RDP
item.description:
Introduction

This short post demonstrates how it may be possible to pivot into a segregated/protected network, via an RDP Jump Box.
